rules_json.script:
def evaluate(board):
    s = material(board)
    s += 60 * bishop_pair_bonus(board, board.turn)
    s += 35 * center_control(board, board.turn)
    ps = pawn_structure(board, board.turn)
    s += 30 * ps.get("passed",0)
    s -= 40 * ps.get("isolated",0)
    s += 8 * mobility(board)
    s -= 200 * (repetition_count(board) >= 2)
    return s
